did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: ILR School Extension Division (Buffalo, N.Y.) Photographs, 1983-1998

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR)

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This is a collection of photographs from Buffalo Labour Studies, BLS Graduates, Career Development, Supervisory Studies, some action shots and miscellaneous ILR images as well as some from the jazz event for the 50th Anniversary reception.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of photographs from Buffalo Labour Studies, BLS Graduates, Career Development, Supervisory Studies, some action shots and miscellaneous ILR images as well as some from the jazz event for the 50th Anniversary reception.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations.
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations. Western Regional Office--Photographs

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: ILR School Extension Division (Buffalo, N.Y.) Photographs #/4283 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
